ƕazuh sa galaubjands du imma ni gaaiwiskoda.
ROM 10.12 ni auk ist gaskaideins Iudaiaus jah Krekis;
sa sama auk frauja allaize, gabigs in allans þans bidjandans sik.
ROM 10.13 ƕazuh auk saei anahaitiþ bidai namo fraujins, ganisiþ.
ROM 10.14 ƕaiwa nu bidjand du þammei ni galaubidedun?
aiþþau ƕaiwa galaubjand þammei ni hausidedun?
ROM 10.15 iþ ƕaiwa merjand, niba insandjanda?
ƕaiwa skaunjai fotjus þize spillondane gawairþi, þize spillondane þiuþ.
ROM 10.16 akei ni allai ufhausidedun aiwaggeljon:
ROM 10.17 þannu galaubeins us gahauseinai, iþ gahauseins þairh waurd Xristaus.
and alla airþa galaiþ drunjus ize jah and andins midjungardis waurda ize.
ik in aljana izwis brigga in unþiudom,
in þiudai unfraþjandein in þwairhein izwis brigga.
ROM 10.20 iþ Esaïas anananþeiþ jah qiþiþ:
bigitans warþ þaim mik ni gasokjandam,
swikunþs warþ þaim mik ni gafraihnandam.
allana dag usbraidida þos handuns meinos du managein ungalaubjandein jah andstandandein.
ak þizai ize missadedai ganists þiudom du in aljana briggan ins.
ROM 11.12 iþ jabai missadeds ize gabei fairƕau jah wanains ize gabei þiudom, ƕan mais fullo ize?
swa lagga swe ik im þiudo apaustaulus, andbahti mein mikilja, ROM 11.14 ei ƕaiwa in aljana briggau leik mein jah ganasjau sumans us im.
ROM 11.15 jabai auk uswaurpa ize gabei fairƕaus, ƕa so andanumts, nibai libains us dauþaim?
ROM 11.16 þandei ufarskafts weiha, jah daigs, jah jabai waurts weiha, jah astos.
ROM 11.17 iþ jabai sumai þize aste usbruknodedun, iþ þu wilþeis alewabagms wisands intrusgiþs warst in ins jah gamains þizai waurhtai jah smairþra alewabagmis warst, ROM 11.18 ni ƕop ana þans astans;
iþ jabai ƕopis, ni þu þo waurt bairis, ak so waurts þuk.
ungalaubeinai usbruknodedun, iþ þu galaubeinai gastost;
ROM 11.21 þandei guþ þans us gabaurþai astans ni freidida, ibai aufto ni þuk freidjai.
ROM 11.22 sai nu selein jah ƕassein gudis;
aþþan ana þaim þaiei gadrusun, ƕassein, iþ ana þus selein, jabai þairhwisis in selein;
ROM 11.23 jah jainai, niba gatulgjand sik in ungalaubeinai, intrusgjanda;
mahteigs auk ist guþ aftra intrusgjan ins.
ROM 11.24 jabai auk þu us wistai usmaitans þis wilþeins alewabagmis jah aljakuns wisands, intrusgans warst in godana alewabagm, ƕan filu mais þai bi wistai intrusgjanda in swesana alewabagm?
ROM 11.25 ni auk wiljau izwis unweisans, broþrjus, þizos runos, ei ni sijaiþ in izwis silbam frodai, unte daubei bi sumata Israela warþ, und þatei fullo þiudo inngaleiþai.
ROM 11.26 jah swa allai Israel ganisand,
urrinniþ us Sion sa lausjands du afwandjan afgudein af Iakoba.
ROM 11.27 jah so im fram mis triggwa, þan afnima frawaurhtins ize.
ROM 11.28 aþþan bi aiwaggeljon fijandans in izwara, iþ bi gawaleinai liubai ana attans.
ROM 11.29 inu idreiga sind auk gibos jah laþons gudis.
ROM 11.30 swaswe raihtis jus suman ni galaubideduþ guda, iþ nu gaarmaidai waurþuþ þizai ize ungalaubeinai, ROM 11.31 swa jah þai nu ni galaubidedun izwarai armaion, ei jah eis gaarmaindau.
